title: Contributors
subtitle: Fellow Travelers
highlight: Great work is never done alone; many hands weave harmony.
fullDescription: Meet the scholars, artists, practitioners, and community members who contribute to the ecological civilization movement. Their diverse expertise and dedication make this work possible.

sections.title: Project Team
sections.content: Learn about the core team behind this educational initiativeâ€”educators, researchers, designers, and developers who work together to create meaningful experiences for visitors.

sections.title: Contributing Scholars
sections.content: Meet the academics and researchers whose work informs our content. These experts bring deep knowledge of ecology, philosophy, cultural heritage, and sustainable development.

sections.title: Community Partners
sections.content: Discover the organizations and communities partnering with us to advance ecological civilization. From local restoration projects to international networks, these partners extend our impact.
